repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: Lorin Tryon Collection of Textile Industry Photographs
did.abstract: Photographs of wool processing in California in the early to mid twentieth century.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183> kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes photographs of wool processing ath Haber Zemel Tryon and E. H. Tryon in Stockton, California. Also includes photographs of the Wool Exchange and the San Francisco Woolen Factory in San Francisco, California.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Lorin Tryon Collection of Textile Industry Photographs #6754 P. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 6618: E. H. Tryon, Inc. Records

did.unittitle: Wool Processing
Item 1: Loom, Haber Zemel Tryon, Inc.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Snapshot, gelatin silver print (?), [mid-20th century?]. Image shows loom of Haber Zemel Tryon, Inc., in interior room. 13 x 10 cm.
Format: black and white photograph.

did.unittitle: Item 2: Spinning jack, Haber Zemel Tryon, Inc.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Snapshot, gelatin silver print (?), [mid-20th century?]. Image shows spinning jack of Haber Zemel Tryon, Inc., in interior room (well lit with skylights). 13 x 10 cm.
Format: black and white photograph.

did.unittitle: Item 3: Picker, Haber Zemel Tryon, Inc.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Snapshot, gelatin silver print (?), [mid-20th century?]. Image shows picker (?) of Haber Zemel Tryon, Inc., in interior room (well lit with skylights). 13 x 10 cm.
Format: black and white photograph.

did.unittitle: Item 4: Wool blending room, mill interior, Stockton, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print, ca. 1910. Image shows interior of wool blending room, with bags of wool to the right; workers holding bundles of wool against wall to the left. Probably the E.H. Tryon wool scouring business in Stockton. 18 x 12.5 cm.
Format: black and white photograph.

did.unittitle: Item 5: Wool dryer, mill interior, Stockton, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print, ca. 1910. Image shows mill interior with wool drying machine; workmen (and one woman) standing next to it. Probably the E.H. Tryon wool scouring business in Stockton. 18 x 12.5 cm.
Format: black and white photograph.

did.unittitle: Item 6: Wool sorting, mill interior, Stockton, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print, ca. 1910. Image shows mill interior with workers sorting wool, picking out the undesirable wool. Piles of wool on floor, some partially bagged. Probably the E.H. Tryon wool scouring business in Stockton. 18 x 12.5 cm.
Format: black and white photograph.

did.unittitle: Item 7: Scouring machine, mill interior, Stockton, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print, ca. 1910. Image shows bins of wool being blended and fed Into a scouring machine. Scouring machine is to the left; huge piles of wool to the right and in the back; workers pose on top of the wool pile. Probably the E.H. Tryon wool scouring business in Stockton. 18 x 13 cm.
Format: black and white photograph.

did.unittitle: Item 8: Belt drives, mill interior, Stockton, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print, ca. 1910. Image shows belt drives that power machinery in mill; male worker stands at right. Probably the E.H. Tryon wool scouring business in Stockton. 18 x 12.5 cm.
Format: black and white photograph.

did.unittitle: Item 9: Women sorting wool, mill interior, Stockton, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print, ca. 1910. Image shows women sorting wool; four are in front of sorting table with large piles of wool on floor and large bags of wool; three women in background behind sorting table, with bags of wool partially visible. Probably the E.H. Tryon wool scouring business in Stockton. 18 x 12.5 cm. See item 17 in this folder for copy print of this photograph.
Format: black and white photograph.

did.unittitle: Item 10: Wool lumper, mill interior, Stockton, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print, ca. 1910. Image shows wool lumper in mill interior in Stockton, Calif., with male worker standing next to it. Lumper built by C.G. Sargent's Sons Corp., Graniteville, Mass. Probably the E.H. Tryon wool scouring business in Stockton. 18 x 12.5 cm.
Format: black and white photograph.

did.unittitle: Item 11: Machinery, mill interior

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Snapshot, gelatin silver print (?), [mid 20th century?]. Image shows mill machinery in interior room, possibly that of Haber Zemel Tryon, Inc. 10 x 13 cm.
Format: black and white photograph.

did.unittitle: Item 12: Wool warehouse, Stockton, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print. Image shows interior of wool warehouse, with extremely large bags of wool piled alongside walls; male supervisor, male worker, and woman (not a worker) in center background. Probably the E.H. Tryon wool scouring business in Stockton. 18.5 x 12.5 cm.
Format: black and white photograph.

did.unittitle: Item 13: Mill interior, Stockton, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print, ca. 1910. Image shows interior of mill, with male and female workers standing at left; two male workers standing behind machinery in right background; bale of wool in right foreground. Probably the E.H. Tryon wool scouring business in Stockton. 18 x 13 cm.
Format: black and white photograph.

did.unittitle: Item 14: Office area, Stockton Scouring Plant (?), Stockton, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print. Image depicts office area with woman employee (switchboard operator?) at left behind counter; man standing at right behind counter. Spittoon on floor in foreground. Purportedly the Stockton Scouring Plant, but does not resemble item 15 in this folder, which is also purportedly the Stockton Scouring Plant. 18 x 13 cm.
Format: black and white photograph.

did.unittitle: Item 15: Office area, Stockton Scouring Plant (?), Stockton, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print. Image depicts office area with woman employee (switchboard operator?) at left behind counter; two men standing behind counter at right. Note radiator in front of counter. Calendar on wall dated April 1913, advertising wool brokers or wool agents from Boston, Mass. Purportedly the Stockton Scouring Plant, but does not resemble item 14 in this folder, which is also purportedly the Stockton Scouring Plant. 18 x 13 cm.
Format: black and white photograph.

did.unittitle: Item 16: Grading wool.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pacific Cooperative Wool Growers. Acme Photo W-5. Gelatin silver print, [19--]. Image depicts interior room, with bags of wool in the background and to the right; one male worker with large bag of wool on two-wheel truck to left; other workers stand in center at table, with empty open crates in front, in which wool will be sorted. Pacific Copoperative Wool Growers stamp on back of photo. 24.5 x 19.5 cm.
Format: black and white photograph.

did.unittitle: Item 17: Women sorting wool, mill interior, Stockton, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print, ca. 1910. Image shows women sorting wool; four are in front of sorting table with large piles of wool on floor and large bags of wool; three women in background behind sorting table, with bags of wool partially visible. Probably the E.H. Tryon wool scouring business in Stockton. See item 9 in this folder for the original of this photograph. 25 x 20.5 cm.
Format: black and white photograph.

did.unittitle: Item 18: Pacific Mail Dock, San Francisco, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print, [19--]. Image shows part of the San Francisco waterfront, with houses and buildings visible on the left; ship masts visible in center and right background; horse and wagon visible in lower left foreground. Note on reverse says "San Francisco waterfront - the hill on the left is now part of the base of the Bay Bridge." This print probably produced in 20th century, possibly from glass plate negative. 25.5 x 20.5 cm.
Format: black and white photograph.

did.unittitle: Item 19: Wool Exchange, San Francisco, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print, [19--; original 1869]. Image depicts the Wool Exchange in San Francisco, Calif., on the NW corner of Sansome (?) St. and Broadway. Building is two story brick, with horse-drawn wagons loaded with bags of wool in front; many more bags of wool are stacked up outside the building. A number of men are standing on the street or sidewalk in front of the building; workers are standing on the bags on the side. Notice on building has date May 23d '69. Possibly printed from a glass plate negative. 25.5 x 20.5 cm.
Format: black and white photograph.

did.unittitle: Item 20: Black Point, San Francisco, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print, [19--]. Image depicts San Francisco Woolen Factory in middle distance; hills behind factory and to the right. Note on reverse says: "Woolen Mill - now part of Ghiradelli Square." This print probably produced in 20th century, most likely from glass plate negative. 25.5 x 20.5 cm. Copy A.
Format: black and white photograph.

did.unittitle: Item 21: Black Point, San Francisco, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print, [19--]. Image depicts San Francisco Woolen Factory in middle distance; hills behind factory and to the right. Note on reverse says: "Woolen Mill - now part of Ghiradelli Square." This print probably produced in 20th century, most likely from glass plate negative. Copy B; image slightly truncated from Copy A. 25 x 20.5 cm.
Format: black and white photograph.

did.unittitle: Item 22: An outing at a sheep ranch

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Copy print of: An outing at a sheep ranch. ca. 1900. Gelatin silver print, [19--]. Image depicts a group of men and boys seated on or standing around bags of wool. The man in the back row on the left, with his hands on his hips, is E.H. Tryon, who owned a wool scouring plant in Stockton, Calif., around the turn of the 20th century. See item 23 in this folder for the original photograph. 25 x 20.5 cm.
Format: black and white photograph.

did.unittitle: Item 23: An outing at a sheep ranch

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: An outing at a sheep ranch. Gelatin silver print, ca. 1900. Image depicts a group of men and boys seated on or standing around bags of wool. The man in the back row on the left, with his hands on his hips, is E.H. Tryon, who owned a wool scouring plant in Stockton, Calif., around the turn of the 20th century. See item 22 in this folder for a copy print of this photograph. 25 x 20.5 cm.
Format: black and white photograph.

did.unittitle: Item 24: Mill workers, Stockton, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print. Image depicts group of men and one boy standing outside warehouse in front of bags of what is probably wool. Written on reverse is: Stockton, June 26, 1907. Probably the E.H. Tryon wool scouring business in Stockton. 17 x 12 cm. (w/out mount); 23 x 18 cm. (w/mount).
Format: black and white photograph.

did.unittitle: Item 25: Wool sorting room.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print, ca. 1910. Image shows the interior of a wool sorting room, with male workers seated or standing behind piles of raw wool and in front of bags of wool. Probably the E.H. Tryon wool scouring business in Stockton. 17 x 12 cm. (w/out mount); 25.5 x 20.5 cm. (w/mount).
Format: black and white photograph.

did.unittitle: Item 26: E.H. Tryon Wool.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Stockton, Calif. Gelatin silver print, ca. 1910. Image shows exterior of mill/warehouse of E.H. Tryon, Stockton, Calif. Tryon owned a wool scouring business. 25.5 x 20.5 cm. See item 27 in this folder for copy print of this photograph.
Format: black and white photograph.

did.unittitle: Item 27: E.H. Tryon Wool

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Stockton, Calif. Gelatin silver print, ca. 1910. Image shows exterior of mill/warehouse of E.H. Tryon, Stockton, Calif. Tryon owned a wool scouring business. See item 26 in this folder for the original of this photograph. 25.5 x 20.5 cm.
Format: black and white photograph.

did.unittitle: Item 28: Wool warehouse, Tryon Plant over 3,000,000 pounds stored.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Probably Stockton, Calif. Over 3,000,000 pounds stored. Logan 'Foto. Gelatin silver print, ca. 1910. Image of the interior of the wool warehouse, with large bags of wool stored on either side of a wooden walkway. 25 x 20.5 cm. (w/out mount); 30.5 x 25.5 cm. (w/mount).
Format: black and white photograph.

did.unittitle: Item 29: Washing room, Tryon Wool Scouring Plant.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Probably Stockton, Calif. Gelatin silver print, ca. 1910. Image depicts the washing room of what is probably the E.H. Tryon Co., a wool scouring business in Stockton. The washer full of wool is to the left. 25 x 20.5 cm. (w/out mount); 30 x 25.5 cm. (w/mount).
Format: black and white photograph.
